articles.title: Video: Pfizer CEO pledges vaccines to low-income countries at zero profit - CNN Video
articles.description: Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla shares Pfizer's plan to bring all its existing and future vaccines to 45 low-income countries at zero profit. Bourla also discusses with CNN's Richard Quest the goal and challenge of developing an annual Covid vaccine.

articles.title: Dr. Anthony Fauci faces off with Sen. Rand Paul in tense exchange: 'An absurd exaggeration' - CNN Video
articles.description: During a Senate committee hearing on the ongoing federal response to the pandemic, Dr. Anthony Fauci faced questions from Sen. Rand Paul (R-KY) about Covid-19 boosters for children. Fauci testified remotely after testing positive for the virus.

articles.author: Camila Moreno Lizarazo, CNN
articles.title: What's open, what's closed on Juneteenth
articles.description: This year marks the second year Juneteenth will be observed as a federal holiday.

articles.author: Tami Luhby, CNN
articles.title: Last summer, this school district served kids 36,000 meals a week. This summer, it will be lucky to serve 600 a week. Here's why.
articles.description: Summer meals programs around the country are drastically shrinking this year because Congress did not extend Covid-19 pandemic waivers that provided school districts with much more freedom to distribute food to kids during the break.
articles.content: (CNN)Last summer, Shenae Rowe was able to provide 36,000 meals a week to hungry kids throughout Warrick County in rural southwest Indiana. Parents could pick up a week's worth of food in one trip to … [+7985 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind, CNN Business
articles.title: The most popular air travel day this year was a mess. That won't change anytime soon
articles.description: Americans gained a new federal holiday last year: Juneteenth. This year the holiday, which commemorates of the end of slavery in the United States, falls on Sunday but it will be observed in many places on Monday, June 20.
articles.content: New York (CNN Business)Americans gained a new federal holiday last year: Juneteenth. This year the holiday, which commemorates of the end of slavery in the United States, falls on Sunday but it will … [+3709 chars]

articles.title: Juneteenth Quiz: How well do you know Emancipation Day?

articles.author: Holly Yan, CNN
articles.title: These children lost young parents to Covid-19. Here's what they want other kids -- and adults -- to know
articles.description: A kindergartener just finished his first day of school when he watched his young mother collapse and take her final breaths. Suddenly, he was orphaned by Covid-19. A 13-year-old girl has suffered panic attacks since her dad's death -- but must stay strong to …

articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: 'Epidemic' of unidentified intestinal disease after Covid wave in North Korea
articles.description: North Korea has dispatched medical crews and epidemiological investigators to a province battling the outbreak of an intestinal disease, state media reported on Sunday.

articles.author: Katia Hetter, CNN
articles.title: The FDA has authorized Covid-19 vaccines for children under 5. What should parents know?
articles.description: CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen explains what parents should know about the FDA's authorization of Covid-19 vaccines for children under 5.
